Static Public Member Functions

static DecodingThreadlet * CreateInstance (Image *image, Bitmap *bitmap, INT frame_idx)

Detailed Description

DecodingThreadlet uses an own thread for converting an image to a bitmap. Decompression, decoding and converting does not affect the system.
